texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: When you need to find information about anything in Plesk, here's some SQL statements that you can use:
texts.text: When you need to find information about anything in Plesk, here's some SQL statements that you can use:

texts.label: code
texts.orig: select concat_ws('@',mail.mail_name,domains.name),accounts.password from domains,mail,accounts where domains.id=mail.dom_id and accounts.id=mail.account_id order by domains.name ASC,mail.mail_name ASC;
texts.text: select concat_ws('@',mail.mail_name,domains.name),accounts.password from domains,mail,accounts where domains.id=mail.dom_id and accounts.id=mail.account_id order by domains.name ASC,mail.mail_name ASC;

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Find e-mail passwords made out of only letters:
texts.text: Find e-mail passwords made out of only letters:

texts.label: code
texts.orig: select concat_ws('@',mail.mail_name,domains.name),accounts.password from domains,mail,accounts where domains.id=mail.dom_id and accounts.id=mail.account_id and accounts.password rlike binary '^[a-z]+$';
texts.text: select concat_ws('@',mail.mail_name,domains.name),accounts.password from domains,mail,accounts where domains.id=mail.dom_id and accounts.id=mail.account_id and accounts.password rlike binary '^[a-z]+$';

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Find e-mail passwords made out of only numbers:
texts.text: Find e-mail passwords made out of only numbers:

texts.label: code
texts.orig: select concat_ws('@',mail.mail_name,domains.name),accounts.password from domains,mail,accounts where domains.id=mail.dom_id and accounts.id=mail.account_id and accounts.password rlike '^[0-9]+$';
texts.text: select concat_ws('@',mail.mail_name,domains.name),accounts.password from domains,mail,accounts where domains.id=mail.dom_id and accounts.id=mail.account_id and accounts.password rlike '^[0-9]+$';

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Find which domains aren't bouncing/rejecting e-mails to unknown recipients:
texts.text: Find which domains aren't bouncing/rejecting e-mails to unknown recipients:

texts.label: code
texts.orig: select d.name as domain, p.value as catchall_address from Parameters p, DomainServices ds, domains d where d.id = ds.dom_id and ds.parameters_id = p.id and p.parameter = 'catch_addr' order by d.name
texts.text: select d.name as domain, p.value as catchall_address from Parameters p, DomainServices ds, domains d where d.id = ds.dom_id and ds.parameters_id = p.id and p.parameter = 'catch_addr' order by d.name
